meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eok Ngo Sandy Topping Patrick Fernan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4432.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Eok Ngo, a production assistant from Monterey Park, California
Sandy Topping, an indexer from Valparaiso, Indiana
Patrick Fernan, a government manager from Madison, Wisconsin (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,999)

tr.td: SESAME STREET
MR. ROGER'S NEIGHBORHOOD
BLUES CLUES
ZOOM
READING RAINBOW
BETWEEN THE LIONS
